title: Camco TastePURE Drinking Water Hose for RV, 50 feet, White (22793)
description: The Camco TastePURE 50-Foot Camper/RV Drinking Water Hose with 5/8-Inch ID is reinforced for maximum kink resistance. The hose won't impart a strong plastic taste to the water. This PVC hose is lead-free, BPA-free and phthalate-free. Made of NSF Certified FWH Hose. Certified to NSF/ANSI/CAN 61 for drinking water. Product is UV-stabilized for a long life. It is CSA lead-free content certified to NSF/ANSI 372 and compliant with all federal and state level lead-free laws. Made in the USA.
